dcterms:creator: A. Shahroudy

dcterms:description: A large scale dataset for 3D human activity analysis containing around 56,000 samples in four different types including depth map, RGB video, IR image, and skeleton sequence, captured by Microsoft Kinect v2.
dcterms:title: NTU-RGB+D

dcterms:description: A large-scale human action video dataset containing 34,000 video clips collected from YouTube, labeled with 400 action classes.
dcterms:title: Kinetics-Skeleton
